body.name: 19" Gel Seat Cushion for Long Sitting Pressure Relief - Cozy Soft Plush Velvet Cover with Gel Cushion for Sitting - Large Gel Seat Cushion, Comfort in Office, Chair, Car, Home, Gaming, Floor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 58 mins
features: THE COMFORT YOU DESERVE: Don't spend another day in discomfort; Our elegantly soft plush cover gel seat cushion for sitting relieves pressure to give you just the right level of support while keeping you cozy

HOURS OF COZY LOUNGING: Made from soft, plush coral fleece material, it's like sitting on a cloud; Our extra large gel seat cushion is sized at 19 x 17.5 x 1.6 inches, enough to cover most office, dining, and gaming chairs.

LONG-LASTING RELIEF: Our unique-design gel seat cushion takes pressure off painful points for lasting relief; Supports posture and encourages proper alignment while sitting for comfort in any position
SUPERIOR ELASTICITY FOR LASTING SUPPORT: The elastic gel insert quickly restores to its original shape; Zipper design makes removing the machine washable cover easy to keep clean and looking great

STAY COOL WHILE SITTING: Whether used for yoga, gaming, airplane, car, or office seat cushion; The honeycomb-shaped gel insert allows air to circulate, preventing sweat and heat build-up for cooling comfort

OUR BRAND PROMISE: Enjoy comfort to the fullest and not have to worry about butt pain from sitting on hard surfaces again. Give our cozy seat cushions a try and if you are not satisfied, we'll provide a full refund!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's the most comfortable seat cushion I have found
reviews.reviewText: I have chronic back issues and sitting on this cushion really helps with the pain. It is cushy and comfortable especially that I do a lot of sitting at my desk. The cover is easy to wash in the washer and dry in the dryer. It doesn't shrink or lose its' shape. I can tell a big difference when it's not on my computer chair. I highly recommend this cushion to anyone who wants pressure relief while sitting for long periods of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfort is great; waiting to see about durability
reviews.reviewText: After one week, I only give it four stars because I don't know how durable it will be. As for comfort, it's a solid five stars!I bought this for relief on a pressure wound for a long term hospital patient. While it's not an approved medical device, all the staff appreciate the comfort it gives. The non-slip bottom has the perfect amount of grip.I plan to buy another for my office chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: very good for chairs that are hard on your bottom. really provides great relief for long sitting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend for students!
reviews.reviewText: As a student, I spend most of time behind my desk studying. I wanted a seat cushion that made sitting long hours more bearable and this cushion fulfilled all my expectations!The cushion is very comfortable and soft to the touch. I feel more support in my lower back and bottom. I like that I can remove the cover if it needs to be cleaned. What also stands out about this cushion is that it does not slide or slip. It stays put on my seat, despite me getting up or shifting my seating position.I highly recommend this cushion for those who work long hours behind a desk! I no longer have pain on my bottom after a long study session :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A bit flimsy
reviews.reviewText: Even after using it for a short while, I noticed that the support wasn't very substantial. Now it flattens out when I sit on it. I have used it for 8 months, whereas another brand (more expensive) has been in use for over a year and has held up better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like so much I bought two
reviews.reviewText: I use this on my sewing chair and it makes sewing more comfortable. Also use in my bed to ease the pain in my left hip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price
reviews.reviewText: It did not help a thing I returned it ... way over priced too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Okay at first but has it’s problems
reviews.reviewText: It was nice at first however it slides all over the place and also the cover shifts making it uncomfortable, bunching the cushion. There also seems to be a tear appearing and seems to get bigger every day of use. From only a couple month use. However I did get a refund so customer service seems pretty good.
